import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./blog.css';import pb from'../../pocketbase';// Adjust path as needed
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBlogs=async()=>{try{const records=await pb.collection('Blog').getFullList();const blogs=records.map(record=>({id:record.id,category:record.category,title:record.title,date:record.date,author:record.author,image:pb.files.getURL(record,record.image)}));setPosts(blogs);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching blog posts:',error);}};fetchBlogs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"blog container section",id:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"Latest Posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog__container grid",children:posts.map(_ref=>{let{id,category,title,date,author,image}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__thumb",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog__category",children:category})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:title,className:"blog__img"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"blog__title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog__dot",children:"."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:author})]})]})]},id);})})]});};export default Blog;
